title: One Million Boys
text: One Million Boys is the code-name of a <a href="robbery">robbery gang</a> known for its notorious robbery activities around <a href="Lagos">Lagos</a> and its surroundings. Originally formed in <a href="Ajegunle">Ajegunle</a> by a group of about 20 boys with the objective of "fighting perceived injustice in the city", some members of the group however hijacked the group into being involved in robbery activities, <a href="rape">rape</a> and <a href="maiming">maiming</a>. A movie titled "1 Million Boyz" was released in 2014 based on their thefts and activities. On October 9, 2012, about 130 suspected members of the group were arrested by the <a href="Lagos%20State%20Police%20Command">Lagos State Police Command</a> during a raid around <a href="Apapa">Apapa</a> and Ajegunle.
